summary: WHILE DRIVING 20 MPH CONSUMER NOTICED FLUID LEAKING FROM UNDERNEATH THE VEHICLE. CONSUMER WAS ABLE TO MAINTAIN CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE, AND DROVE IT TO A  BODY SHOP.   MECHANIC DETERMINED THAT THE  FUEL PRESSURE REGULATOR AND CHECK VALVES NEEDED TO BE REPLACED DUE TO EXCESSIVE FUEL IN ONE TANK. THIS INFORMATION WAS PROVIDED BY JULIAN TORRES SON JESSE TORRES.*AK  THE CONSUMER FILLED BOTH THE FRONT AND BACK FUEL TANK WITH GASOLINE.  THE VEHICLE WAS 60 MILES AWAY WHEN THE CONSUMER NOTICED THE FUEL GAUGE GOING DOWN FASTER THAN NORMAL.THE CONSUMER. WHEN THE CONSUMER REACHED HIS DESTINATION  HE NOTICED THE FUEL LOST AMOUNTED TO 9 TO 13 GALLONS.  HE STEPPED OUT OF THE VEHICLE AND NOTICED FUEL RUNNING DOWN THE FENDER TOWARDS THE GROUND.  FUEL WAS LEAKING FROM THE FRONT FUEL TANK FROM AROUND THE GAS CAP.
